The 3-Stage Rollout


Our phased approach builds a robust ecosystem, starting with engagement, moving to verification, and culminating in investor access.



Engagement

Goal: Generate Volume


Attract businesses with gamified tools like the "Momentum Meter" and "Progress Sprints".

Verification

Goal: Amplify Signal


Vet businesses by connecting live data (Shopify, Xero) via "KNOTULUS Connect".

Investor Access

Goal: Meet Capital


Launch investor licenses for a curated feed of verified, high-momentum businesses.
